A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars film to date. I saw Force Awakens 4 times because I overall felt it was a good movie (It wasn't what I wanted as a fan\, but I understood it was a movie to set up future movies). Last Jedi is full of plot holes\, bad character development\, and had too many jokes. I will not see this movie again and I will not see the next one. Watch Angryjoes \"10 things he hates about Last Jedi.\" I agree with just about all of it.
